name: asagi
normalized: …ah, uu… kuh…
feeling hazy, i slowly awoke.
my eyelids were heavy, like they had been sewn together.

name: asagi
normalized: that dream… again…
no, a nightmare.
and that was unmistakably the reality that i had experienced up to this point.

name: asagi
normalized: uu… uuh…
my body shivered when i thought about the fact that this was where i was now.
the consequence of having gotten on board with kiryuu's proposal was that i had been remodelled with an even more wretchedly pitiful body.
the effect of oboro's 【hypnotic seal】 was that i continued my losing streak in the arena without change, and became the plaything for a large number of men each time.
after that…

name: asagi
normalized: ah… uu, gu… guh…
it was useless.
it seemed like if i had my eyes closed any longer, i would end up seeing that nightmare again.
and so, i slowly opened my eyes.
it seemed that i had fallen asleep before i knew it.
the absolute worst feeling.
it was a feeling like i had been raped again, thanks to the dream i saw during my brief nap.

name: asagi
normalized: but…
i didn't have time to be absorbed in that feeling.
while thinking so, i looked at the clock.
more time had passed than i imagined.

name: asagi
normalized: …i have to hurry.
the truth was that i didn't want to hasten things, and yet i changed into that outfit.
the outfit of a proud taimanin.

name: asagi
normalized: however… i'm… no longer…
i was illuminated by the afterglow of a noble spirit that had once shone.

name: asagi
normalized: now… i'm… no longer… no longer…
no longer a taimanin.
that outfit was no longer anything more than a literal decoration.
indeed.
because i was now a bitch whose only purpose was to satisfy the lusts of her customers.
tokyo―
a city that had once symbolized majesty and prosperity, the likes of which had never before been obtained by any being born on the earth.
a vainglorious metropolis, where countless buildings shot up towards the heavens as if to show off their existence.
a hellish city where the number of youma mixing in with the humans was gradually increasing.
a few months after the woman who had been called madam was defeated in the chaos arena, which was positioned at the heart of that city's underworld.
having destroyed her archenemy, oboro, what awaited asagi were even more days of hell.
ryuumon.
that was the dark organization which controlled tokyo kingdom from the shadows.
this place was a hellish district controlled by a different dark power than edwin black, one of the leading figures of the underworld.
and so…
a certain taimanin had been caught in one of the countless traps that had been laid throughout the district, which was a complicated maze of innumerable alleyways.
in the beginning, having received news of terrorists, three taimanin had gone on an infiltration investigation, then cut off contact.
not knowing that that itself was a trap, asagi had joined the investigation along with her younger sister, sakura.
there, asagi had a second reunion.
oboro.
she was a kunoichi who was supposed to have been completely annihilated by asagi.
the first time, with a human body.
the second time, with a body that had absorbed a youma.
oboro had accomplished her second resurrection through evil cloning technology that was being secretly developed by ryuumon.
the appearance of an oboro who had the same skills, sadistic mind, and morbid obsession with asagi.
a life-or-death struggle with the dark taimanin, and then defeat.
what awaited her after the appearance of the new organization and its boss, clone oboro, was rape hell.
a large amount of depressing sexual remodelling with no regard for humanity.
asagi and sakura had their pride and fighting spirit smashed to pieces, and were working as prostitutes of a brothel that ryuumon operated.
the once-famous taimanin sisters.
every day, the remodelled sisters led wretched lives as popular sex commodities, just for the sake of staying alive.
…it's time, huh?
after kicking away a number of cigarette butts that lay scattered at my feet, i started to walk.
i headed for the brothel in order to keep my appointment.
and then, under the guidance of an extremely impolite old woman, i was shown to the room.
i entered the room, and immediately had my breath taken away.

name: asagi
normalized: welcome, okyaku-sama.
」(customer)
i knew the woman who welcomed her customer by kneeling down with both hands on the floor.

name: asagi
normalized: i am pig bitch prostitute asagi.
thank you for letting a woman like me give you sexual gratification.
asagi.
i had come to such a suspicious brothel for the sake of meeting this person.
…however.
asagi slightly cocked her head at me, since i had said nothing, no matter how much time passed.
（is this “that” asagi…?
she was completely different from the woman i knew.
however, no matter how much she had changed, this person was “that” asagi.
the detestable enemy i had been pursuing.
there was no way i could forget this hateful woman's face.
the strongest taimanin, who once inflicted a serious wound on me that brought me to the brink of death, asagi!
hey, oi?

name: asagi
normalized: yes, what is it?
do you remember me?

name: asagi
normalized: yes.
i apologize for the trouble before… at that time.
while smiling gently, asagi nodded at my words.

name: asagi
normalized: now, like this, i am repenting, and atoning for my crimes by being used as everyone's toilet woman.
ho…
no mistake.
this person was asagi.
it was asagi, the taimanin who had destroyed my life!

name: asagi
normalized: in apology for that time, today, please enjoy asagi the meat toilet to your heart's content.
and then, asagi, whose eyes were filled with the flames of desire, gently smiled once again.
y…ou…!
a momentary murderous impulse awoke in the depths of my mind due to that expression.
don't screw with me!

name: asagi
normalized: agu!
leaving it to my anger, i kicked my leg upwards, and it was driven into asagi's face.

name: asagi
normalized: o… okyaku-sama… what are you…?
shut up!

name: asagi
normalized: obuh!
once again.
this time, i set my aim, and drove a knee into the bridge of her nose.
the feeling of her nose bending dug into my kneecap.
but that was all.

name: asagi
normalized: please forgive me…
asagi begged for forgiveness while a red streak trickled from her nose.

name: asagi
normalized: please, please forgive me…
this was “that” asagi.
“that” asagi was now uncouthly kneeling and begging for forgiveness with a dripping nosebleed.
ka… ka… kakaa!
i made a smile that looked like my mouth had burst open from side to side.
kuhahahahahaa!
i could do nothing but laugh.
it was natural.
it was natural, since i had been waiting for this moment.

name: man
normalized: dammit, dammit, dammit!
a man's hysterical voice resounded, joining the countless lines of fire that tore through the darkness.

name: man
normalized: what's happening?!
is that woman a monster?!
my subordinates, who had received the best possible training as mercenaries.
they were now being toyed with by just one girl, and even the subordinates who had been fighting to the end died without a sound, and fell down on the spot.
12 skilled soldiers were exterminated in the blink of an eye, and i even had my leg slashed.
shi…t…
i couldn't get up, and a “monster” was standing in the way in front of me.
kuh!
a flowing body, as if it had grown out of the pool of blood that spread out at my feet.
that figure, which was covered in spurts of blood, somehow seemed like it was from a different world.
was i… fascinated by her?
was i, who had crossed over numerous hell-like battlefields, charmed by a girl like this?
or, was this person death?
in the face of death, would i just accept it?
d, don't screw with me!
immediately, i came to my senses and readied my gun.
ugu!
a flash.
after a slight delay, the gun i had readied was cut in half.
and, by the time i had grasped that fact, the cold feeling of metal was touching the nape of my neck.

name: asagi
normalized: …are you a mercenary?
…yeah.
in the span of just a few seconds, i thought of dozens of responses.

name: asagi
normalized: were you commissioned to kill me?
…that's right.
right now, i was being “interrogated”.
if i chose an option that was even slightly wrong, i would probably die.

name: asagi
normalized: who is your client?

name: asagi
normalized: …won't answer, huh…?
my throat gulped due to her monotonous voice.

name: asagi
normalized: i let you live on purpose.
tell your client that i will definitely obliterate him.
it seemed she had a good idea of who my client was.

name: asagi
normalized: wash your neck and wait… you should tell him that.
she said, while drawing the edge of her blade, which was pointed at the nape of my neck, back a little.
…i had been spared.
that moment, a feeling of relief filled me.
…what if i refuse?
that didn't go well.

normalized: hmph…
ugii?!

guhaah!

agii!
giih!

y…you, aguu!

you… you bit…ch…

name: asagi
normalized: tell them, or don't tell them?

name: asagi
normalized: …what will you do?
aah… i get it!
i get it!
i, i'll tell them!

name: asagi
normalized: i see…
the woman made a derisive smile at my words, as i clung to life while letting out pained breaths.
i watched that smile in fascination.
beautiful.
i honestly thought so.
however, at the same time, i seemed tremendously small and pitiful.
uu… gi… iih…
the woman was looking down from high above at my tiny self, who could do nothing but beg for my life.
the moment i understood that, the feelings i had just experienced for the woman were turned on their head.
kill… you…
a beauty looking down on my pitiful self like this.
i'll kill… you!
i'll definitely… definitely kill you!
no, i'll destroy you!
